004package pgs;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import mkt.Models;
008import mkt.Model;
009import kut.*;
010import data.RkRow;
011import data.Rk;
012import data.RkEntry;
013import data.Ival;
014import data.SimParams;
015import data.Imodel;
016import main.Cts;
017import main.Db;
018
019/** Rank global Page. */
020public class GlobalPg {
021  /**
022  Process request.
023  @param drq Ditto.
024  @return JSON string.
025  */
026  public static String process (Dic<String> drq) {
027    String rq = Js.rs(drq.get("rq"));
028    switch (rq) {
029      case "idata": {
030        String type = Js.rs(drq.get("type"));
031        String stats = Js.rs(drq.get("stats"));
032        return Js.w(Dic.mk(
033          "initialCapital", Js.w(mkt.Cts.initialCapital),
034          "All", Arr.toJs(mkRankRows(type, stats), RkRow::toJs),
035          "Models", Arr.toJs(
036            Arr.map(Models.list(), (md) -> {
037              String mdId = md.id;
038              double[] bases = SimParams.paramBases(mdId);
039              double[] incrs = SimParams.paramIncrs(mdId);
040              return new Imodel(
041                mdId, md.name,
042                md.paramNames, md.paramTypes, bases, incrs
043              );
044            }),
045            (im) -> im.toJs()
046          )
047        ));
048      }
049      default: throw new RuntimeException(
050          "Value of rq (" + rq + ") is not valid"
051        );
052    }
053  }
054
055  static ArrayList<RkRow> mkRankRows (String type, String stats) {
056    ArrayList<RkRow> r = new ArrayList<>();
057    for (String period : Cts.periods)
058      r.add(new RkRow(period, mkRanks(type, stats, period)));
059    return r;
060  }
061
062  static ArrayList<Rk> mkRanks (String type, String stats, String period) {
063    ArrayList<Rk> r = new ArrayList<>();
064    ArrayList<String> dates = Db.rankDates(period);
065    for (int i = 0; i < dates.size(); ++i)
066      r.add(new Rk(dates.get(i), mkEntries(type, stats, period, i)));
067    return r;
068  }
069
070  static ArrayList<RkEntry> mkEntries (
071    String type, String stats, String period, int idate
072  ) {
073    ArrayList<RkEntry> r = new ArrayList<>();
074    for (String mdId : Arr.map(Models.list(), (m) -> m.id)) {
075      Opt<Ival> inValOp = Db.rankValue(mdId, period, type, idate, stats);
076      if (inValOp.isNone())
077        r.add(new RkEntry(mdId, 0, Opt.none()));
078      else {
079        Ival inVal = inValOp.getValue();
080        r.add(new RkEntry(mdId, inVal.ix, Opt.some(inVal.val)));
081      }
082    }
083
084    return r;
085  }
086}
087
